The CF is pretty damaged by now. Holes here and there almost all the way 
through, dents and pissing plates. Sore areas smoking, electricle fires 
something to be watching out for with exterier circuitry.

* IR sped up, feeling the ground almost fly away under her feet.
She was almost right at Divebomb before she felt three charges try to dig 
into her armor, snarling and turning her head towards FireBlade, stopping in 
her tracks. The charges had hit dead on but they did little but sting, only 
making her want to kill something more.
And it seemed that FireBlade was eager to be the first to try her out.
Lowering her chin almost to the ground she looked almost like a crouching 
cat, resting the weight of her torso on her front arms as she set her hands 
against the ground.
She began to walk forward, towards FireBlade on all fours, her tail swaying 
back and fourth.
But all that was before the suddenly opened her mouth and shot her head 
forward, spitting a spray of yellow gew at the enemy.
Acid!*
